text.div:
Campylobacteriosis (Tests for Campylobacter species by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    20738-1 Campylobacter sp identified in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    20739-9 Campylobacter sp identified in Body fluid by Organism specific culture
    20740-7 Campylobacter sp identified in Tissue by Organism specific culture
    6330-5 Campylobacter sp identified in Blood by Organism specific culture
    6331-3 Campylobacter sp identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    6332-1 Campylobacter sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    82302-1 Campylobacter sp [Presence] in Stool by Culture
